## Purpose
Request explicit product-owner approval disposition for Issue #29 after tranche-level quality consolidation completed.

Post a comment on GitHub Issue #29 with one of:
- `Approved — Product Owner sign-off for Issue #29 tranche closure`
- `Changes Requested — Product Owner sign-off withheld` (include specific blocking reasons)

## Decision Criteria
- Business messaging remains trust-safe and decision-safe.
- No regression against canonical private-boarding positioning.
- Tranche evidence supports progression to release governance.

## Output Requirement
Include evidence references in the comment and a clear final disposition (`Approved` or `Changes Requested`).
